metadata.title: CVE-2022-48753 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: block:fix memory leak in disk_register_independent_access_rangeskobject_init_and_add() takes reference even when it fails. According to thedoc of kobject_init_and_add() If this function returns an error,kobject_put() must be called to properly clean up the memory associatedwith the object. Fix this issue by adding kobject_put(). Callback functionblk_ia_ranges_sysfs_release() in kobject_put() can handle the pointer"iars" properly.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
